thread.title: SGS to Exhibit at ABC Kids Expo 2015 in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: SGS to Exhibit at ABC Kids Expo 2015 in Las Vegas | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: SGS to Exhibit at ABC Kids Expo 2015 in Las Vegas
text:
(MENAFN Press) Meet the SGS toy experts at ABC Kids Expo 2015! AIX EN PROVENCE France - Oct. 12 2015 - PRLog -- ABC Kids Expo is a private trade show for the juvenile products industry and is not open to the general public. It is the premier juvenile products specialty show in the world with nearly 1000 exhibitors utilizing 3300 booths. SGS will exhibit and present at Booth #4337 at the 2015 edition in Las Vegas.Toy Safety from A to Z at ABC Kids Expo 2015Experience virtually every significant manufacturer or distributor of products for infants and children presenting their newest most innovative products and services in over 1 million square feet of exhibit space.SGS will be present to help build knowledge of global compliance for juvenile products and can work to set up customized testing programs to suite clients'' needs. The SGS experts can help at every stage of development from concept to shelf.Visit the SGS experts at Booth #4337. As the JPMA Certification Program Principal Testing Lab and Program Administrator SGS can also answer all questions on program certification and help with:- Product safety/quality assurance solutions across supply chain- Risk Assessment- JPMA Certification (http://www.sgs.com/en/Consumer-Goods-Retail/Toys-and-Juve...)- Testing- Auditing- Inspection- Pre-shipment Testing- Consultancy Services- Sustainability and Ecodesign ServiceVisitors are invited to schedule a meeting and visit SGS Booth #4337.Show Dates: October 18 - 21 2015Show Site: Las Vegas Convention Center NVPlease do not hesitate to contact an SGS representative.Website: http://www.sgs.com/toysLinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/sgs-consumer-goods-&-retailSGS is the world''s leading inspection verification testing and certification company. SGS is recognized as the global benchmark for quality and integrity. With more than 80000 employees SGS operates a network of over 1650 offices and laboratories around the world. ContactStephanie Meyer-Pionchon 33 4 42 61 64 --- End ---
